title: ENG-297999:  Patient 0 | hold_until_proven | SKOPEIT Application event/ Alert doesn't have policy name for the relevant (hold_required) events ( Block and justification event)
custom_summary:
Patient 0 | hold_until_proven | SKOPEIT Application event/ Alert doesn't have policy name for the relevant (hold_required) events ( Block and justification event)


While the above is presented, there is a block event generated at the Application event and following this there is a justification event ( when user clicks on OK or if justification times-out) 

These events doesn’t have policy name field explicitly referring to the policy that’s triggering hold action
custom_steps:
Create the hold until proven policy on the UI 
Generate the event for the same
custom_expected: Hold until proven event should contain name in it
